Articles.Content:
Just watched that. reminds me of somthign my dad always said. "the best things ever invented where always made in Britain in a garden shed"

Also reminded me from WW2 where the Government was ignoring that guy Frank Whittle who invented the jet engine, if they didnt then there would of been a good chance of Britain Avignon jet aircraft at the start of WW2
Not about KSP, so off to Off-Topic it goes!

oh how cool
